external_references.description: Sherstobitoff, R. (2018, March 02). McAfee Uncovers Operation Honeybee, a Malicious Document Campaign Targeting Humanitarian Aid Groups. Retrieved May 16, 2018.

description: During [Operation Honeybee](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0006), the threat actors used a legitimate Windows executable and secure directory for their payloads to bypass UAC.(Citation: McAfee Honeybee)
